skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
If you've got the Warptokens and the contacts, you can get all manner of fine, murderous armaments crafted to fit claw or tail perfectly.
Ikk Hackflay has made a living off of stealing armour plate from other cultures, and he's learned how to share it. He still gets the biggest piece of the pie, of course

effects.description: Armour and missile resistance: +1 for affected units

skillTree.localised_description: Stealing from, and slaying, dwarves is one of Ikk Hackflay's greatest passions

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against Dwarfs
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You were called by the Horned Rat, his power to wield. Ride forth, wielding blades of steel!"

effects.description:
Missile resistance and Ward save: +5% for Clanrats and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +5% for Clanrats and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance and Ward save: +10% for Clanrats and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Clanrats and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Rats of Clan Mors do not go quietly into the good night, but rise to fight another day

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Carry on my rats forever, carry on when I am gone. Carry on for when the day is long, forever carry on!"
Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
As you might expect, the forces of order are repelled by the Skaven and their myriad disgusting, disease-ridden ways.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Lizardmen
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves, Lizardmen, Dwarfs and men

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No rat has held the line more for his clan than Ikk Hackflay. None shall pass. Especially not Dwarves

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect increasesproportional to the number of friendly units in range
